head.title: 《中国商贸》2013年 17 期-万方学术圈
中国商贸.China Business & Trade 중국상무(2013年17期)

div.script: $.cachedScript = function (url, callback) { try { var options = { dataType: "script", cache: true, url: url, success: callback } $.ajax(options); } catch (ex) { console.log('动态加载Script失败:' + ex) } } function getCookie(name) { var cookieArray = document.cookie.split("; "); var val = null; $(cookieArray).each(function () { var arr = this.split("="); if ($.trim(arr[0]) == name) { val = decodeURIComponent(arr[1]); } }); return val; } function GetAuthContext() { var context = getCookie('WFKS.Auth'); return eval('(' + context + ')'); } function GetDisplayName(context, accountType, key) { for (var i = 0; i < context.Data.length; i++) { if (context.Data[i].Key == (accountType + "." + key + ".DisplayName")) return decodeURIComponent(context.Data[i].Value); } return key; } function getNotificationInfo(accountIdContainer) { var href = 'http://social.wanfangdata.com.cn/Blog/Comment.aspx'; var cls = 'mailimg'; try { $.getJSON('http://social.wanfangdata.com.cn/Services/NotificationService.ashx?callback=?', null, function (json) { if (json != null && json.length > 0) { var url = ""; switch (json[0].Type) { case "Comment": url = "Comment.aspx"; break; case "Forward": url = "Forward.aspx"; break; case "Chat": url = "ChatHistory.aspx"; break; default: url = "Fans.aspx"; break; } href = 'http://social.wanfangdata.com.cn/Blog/' + url; cls = 'mailinfor'; } accountIdContainer.prepend('|') }); } catch (ex) { } } function GetAccountIdObj(accountIdStr) { var accountId = { AccountType: '', Key: '' }, index = accountIdStr.indexOf("."); if (index === -1) { accountId.AccountType = accountIdStr; } else { accountId.AccountType = accountIdStr.substring(0, index); accountId.Key = accountIdStr.substring(index + 1); } return accountId; } function refreshloginStatus() { var accountIdContainer = $('#accountIdContainer').html(''); var register = '注册| '; var charge = '充值| '; var guide = '帮助|满意度调查|'; var home = '公司首页'; var loginurl = 'http://login.wanfangdata.com.cn/Login.aspx'; var location = document.location.href.toLocaleLowerCase(); if (location.indexOf('http://login.wanfangdata.com.cn/'.toLocaleLowerCase()) == -1 || location.indexOf('returnurl') == -1) { loginurl += '?ReturnUrl=' + encodeURIComponent(document.location.href); } var login = '登录| ' var authContext = GetAuthContext(); if (authContext == null || authContext.Context.AccountIds.length == 0) { accountIdContainer.append(login).append(register).append(charge).append(guide).append(home); return; } var showNotify = false, showOrder = false, personId = null, magazineId = null, researcherId = null, groups = [], orderUrl=''; $(authContext.Context.AccountIds).each(function () { var _this = GetAccountIdObj(this); if (_this.AccountType == "Person") { personId = _this.Key; } if (_this.AccountType == "Researcher" || _this.AccountType == "VerifiedUser") { researcherId = _this.Key; showNotify = true; } if (_this.AccountType == "MagazineInstitution") { magazineId = _this.Key; showNotify = true; } if (_this.AccountType == "Group") { var displayName = GetDisplayName(authContext.Context, _this.AccountType, _this.Key); groups.push({ Key: _this.Key, Name: displayName }); } if (_this.AccountType == "IsticTimeLimit" || _this.AccountType == "IsticBalanceLimit") { showOrder = true; orderUrl='http://istic.wanfangdata.com.cn/Order'; } }); //以下按显示顺序添加 if (showNotify) { getNotificationInfo(accountIdContainer); } if (personId != null) { var space = ''; if (personId == magazineId) { var displayName = GetDisplayName(authContext.Context, 'MagazineInstitution', magazineId) space = '(机构空间)'; } else if (personId == researcherId) { space = '(个人空间)'; //显示弹出框 $.cachedScript('http://www.wanfangdata.com.cn/share/Script/correlateScholarPopup-1.1.js', function () { if ($.isFunction(showCorrelateScholar)) { showCorrelateScholar(personId, 'http://social.wanfangdata.com.cn/'); } }); } accountIdContainer.append('' + personId + '' + space+'|'); } if (groups.length == 1) { accountIdContainer.append('' + groups[0].Name + '服务站 '); if (showOrder) { accountIdContainer.append('(查询订单)| '); }else{ accountIdContainer.append('| '); } } if (groups.length > 1) { var clickCount = 0; var options = $('').click(function () { if (clickCount++ > 0) { document.location = 'http://g.wanfangdata.com.cn/Organization?userId=' + options.val(); } }).focus(function () { clickCount = 0; }); $.each(groups, function () { options.append($('' + this.Name + '')); }); accountIdContainer.append(options); if (showOrder) { accountIdContainer.append('(查询订单)| '); }else{ accountIdContainer.append('| '); } } accountIdContainer.append(login).append('退出| '); if (personId != null) { accountIdContainer.append(charge) } accountIdContainer.append(guide).append(home); } try { refreshloginStatus(); } catch (ex) { }

function showImgDelay(imgObj, imgSrc, maxErrorNum) { if (maxErrorNum > 0) { imgObj.onerror = function () { showImgDelay(imgObj, imgSrc, maxErrorNum - 1); }; setTimeout(function () { imgObj.src = imgSrc; }, 5); } else { imgObj.onerror = null; } }

body.script: if ($('.index_leftwidth').width() > 800) { $('.index_leftwidth').width(800); } function GetAccountIdObj(accountIdStr) { var accountId = { AccountType: '', Key: '' }, index = accountIdStr.indexOf("."); if (index === -1) { accountId.AccountType = accountIdStr; } else { accountId.AccountType = accountIdStr.substring(0, index); accountId.Key = accountIdStr.substring(index + 1); } return accountId; } var navigationString = "F7.贸易经济;F.经济财政"; var treeLogoDisplay = "false" var currentDatabase = ""; var localUrl = document.location.href.toLocaleLowerCase(); $.researcherLogin.setDefaults({ cookieName: 'WFKS.Auth', loginDomain: 'http://login.wanfangdata.com.cn/', communityDomain: 'http://social.wanfangdata.com.cn/' }); (function () { //根据是否为编辑部用户并且用户权限是“优先出版”来决定是否显示优先出版页导航 var context = GetAuthContext(); var isMagazineInstitution = "false"; var isPrePublish = "false"; var isCurrentUser = false; if (context) { var personId = null; var magazineId = null; $(context.Context.AccountIds).each(function () { var _this = GetAccountIdObj(this); if (_this.AccountType == "Person") { personId = _this.Key; } if (_this.AccountType == "MagazineInstitution") { isMagazineInstitution = "true"; magazineId = _this.Key; } }); var sendInfo = $("#sendinfor"); if (personId != null && personId == magazineId) {//对于社区,登录的Person帐户与编辑部帐户一致才被认为是期刊帐户登录 var displayName = GetDisplayName(context.Context, "MagazineInstitution", magazineId); if ('zhonggsm' == displayName) {//判断该登录的编辑部帐号是不是对应的当前所在期刊 sendInfo.replaceWith(''); } else { sendInfo.show(); } } else { sendInfo.show(); } $(context.Context.Data).each(function () { if (this.Key.indexOf("PeriodicalRight") >= 0 && this.Value == "PrePublish") isPrePublish = "true"; }); if (isMagazineInstitution == "true") $("#paperRegular").parent("li").show(); if (isMagazineInstitution == "true" && isPrePublish == "true") $("#paperPublish").parent("li").show(); } if (treeLogoDisplay.indexOf("true") >= 0) $("#treeLogo").show(); $("#periodicalTab").children().removeClass("current"); if (localUrl.indexOf("http://c.wanfangdata.com.cn/".toLocaleLowerCase()) >= 0 && localUrl.indexOf("periodicalprofile") < 0) { $("#linkPaper").parent().addClass("current"); $("#SiteSelect_new").val("WF_QK"); } if (localUrl.indexOf("http://contribute.wanfangdata.com.cn/".toLocaleLowerCase()) >= 0) { $("#linkArticleSolicitation").parent().addClass("current"); $("#SiteSelect_new").val("ArticleSolicitation"); } if (localUrl.indexOf("periodicalprofile") >= 0) { $("#linkMagazine").parent().addClass("current"); $("#SiteSelect_new").val("CurrentPeriodical"); } if (localUrl.indexOf("http://stats.editors.wanfangdata.com.cn/".toLocaleLowerCase()) >= 0) { $("#linkPeriodicalState").parent().addClass("current"); $("#SiteSelect_new").val("Magazine"); } if (localUrl.indexOf("/Blog".toLocaleLowerCase()) >= 0) { $("#linkBlog").parent().addClass("current"); $("#SiteSelect_new").val("WF_QK"); } if (localUrl.indexOf("http://publish.wanfangdata.com.cn/Publish".toLocaleLowerCase()) >= 0) { $("#paperPublish").parent().addClass("current"); $("#SiteSelect_new").val("WF_QK"); } if (localUrl.indexOf("http://publish.wanfangdata.com.cn/Regular".toLocaleLowerCase()) >= 0) { $("#paperRegular").parent().addClass("current"); $("#SiteSelect_new").val("WF_QK"); } $("#searchBox_qk").keypress(function (e) { if (e.which == 13) return search(); }); $("#searchButton_qk").click(function (event) { return search(); }); if (navigationString.indexOf(";") > 0 && navigationString.indexOf(".")) { var navigation = navigationString.split(";"); $("#oneClass ").attr("href", "http://c.wanfangdata.com.cn/PeriodicalSubject.aspx?NodeID=" + navigation[0].split(".")[0]).html(navigation[0].split(".")[1]); $("#twoClass ").attr("href", "http://c.wanfangdata.com.cn/PeriodicalSubject.aspx?NodeID=" + navigation[1].split(".")[0]).html(navigation[1].split(".")[1]); $("#PeridicalNavigation").show(); } getSubInfo($("#container_sub_qk"), "MagazineInstitution.zhonggsm"); showDoiPdf(); })(); function search() { var query = $.trim($("#searchBox_qk").val()); currentDatabase = $("#SiteSelect_new").val(); if (query == "") { alert('请输入检索词!'); return false; } var from = "&f=" + ((currentDatabase == "CurrentPeriodical") ? "InJournals" : "c.Periodical"); if (currentDatabase == "Magazine") { window.location.href = "http://s.wanfangdata.com.cn/Journal.aspx?q=" + encodeURIComponent(query) + from; return false; } if (currentDatabase == "CurrentPeriodical") { query = query + " PeriodicalID:zhonggsm"; window.location.href = "http://s.wanfangdata.com.cn/Paper.aspx?q=" + encodeURIComponent(query) + from; return false; } if (currentDatabase == "WF_QK") { query = query + " DBID:WF_QK" window.location.href = "http://s.wanfangdata.com.cn/Paper.aspx?q=" + encodeURIComponent(query) + from; } if (currentDatabase == "ArticleSolicitation") { window.location.href = "http://contribute.wanfangdata.com.cn/Search?keyword=" + encodeURIComponent(query); return false; } return false; } function showDoiPdf(){ var isDoi="True".toLocaleLowerCase(); if(isDoi=="true") $(".doiLink").show(); else $(".doiLink").hide(); }

body.script: $(function () { showRelatedResearchers('relativeResearchers', 'http://social.wanfangdata.com.cn/', ["对策","中小企业","企业","民营企业","对策建议","增值税","内部控制","问题","可持续发展","财务管理"],false) }); function showDoiPdf(periodicalId) { var periodicalIds="${DoiPeriodicalIds}".split(","); $.each(periodicalIds,function(index,item){ if(item==periodicalId){ $("#doiPdfLink").show(); return false; } }); }
